reviews.customers_say: Customers praise the sweater's quality, with one noting excellent workmanship on the turtle neck, and appreciate its beautiful color and soft, luxurious feel.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Wife Loves This Sweater Due to Exceptional Quality
items.body: This sweater will definitely get you out of the doghouse. Very soft and fits my wife very well. Great sweater without being bulky. Read more
items.author: Roy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars A classic black turtleneck
items.body: This is a classic black turtleneck made in luxurious cashmere. It feels very soft. The cashmere is medium thickness not as thin as some but not really thick either, so the turtle neck is good for layering - warm without adding bulk. The turtle neck covers my entire neck and stands straight up so it keeps my neck warm. We just went from nice and warm weather to really cool evenings and this turtle neck has been perfect in the evenings. The workmanship on the turtle neck is excellent. I am including a couple of photos of the inside seams - the best way to tell how well a garment is made - and they very neat and nice looking. The turtle neck is true to size. I love black turtle necks they go with so many things, and this has become my favorite among a large assortment. This turtle neck is provided to me for review and testing the fit by Jennie Liu. Ali Julia review Read more
items.author: Ali Julia

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great value, a lot of soft cashmere for the money.
items.body: I was thrilled with the unexpected quality of this sweater. It was good cashmere, very soft on my neck and I have extemely sensitive skin. The thickness was very good for the price. I ordered the extra large because I have found the sizing on cashmere and leather to lean towards a size smaller. The amount of cashmere is awesome. The sleeves and the body of this sweater would be fine for a 6 foot tall woman, who plays football, as the shoulders were also quite wide. I am afraid to order a large as I think it would pull across my bust. I will be happy with the amount of luxurious cashmere. The baby blue is a beautiful color. Read more
items.author: Cash01

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater
items.body: The sweater arrived promptly and was well packaged. It's attractive and fits well. It's also wonderfully soft. My only disappointment was that the turtleneck collar doesn't sit well, but the sweater is nonetheless very nice and I am glad to recommend it. Read more
items.author: Linda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite Cashmere Sweater
items.body: This sweater is so perfect I don't even know where to begin with the praise. It is my personal opinion that a cashmere sweater given it's price should have a classic fit so it will be wearable many years. This sweater exactly fits the bill for my idea of a classic fit: slim and skimming, never tight, never sack like. It's slightly nipped in at the waist for a flattering fit. The sleeves are skimming the arms without being snug at all, and without being bulky. The length is perfect: the sweater touches the lowest point of the pocket opening which again in my book is classic -- not too short and not too long. The material is densely yet finely knit -- perfect for California temperatures and perfect for tucking into high-waisted skirts and pants. The turtleneck sits right against the neck without being tight, and is nice and high (elegant!). The neck opening is wide enough to allow putting the sweater on and taking it off comfortably. It's the tiniest bit scratchy now but I know this will change after the first gentle hand washing. I'm 5"5' and 140 lbs and ordered the Medium. I love it so much that I immediately ordered more colors. Read more
items.author: wild child's mom

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Weird fit, otherwise lovely
items.body: Lovely light grey color and lovely "hand". The yarn has a great feel and a nice loft. But the sweater was baggy on me and I believe that either the yarn doesn't have enough stretch or that the knitting is not what we are used to here in the US. I'm a true XS - almost every brand fits me in this size - but this was baggy in odd places. Shoulder width, neck size, and sleeve length were all appropriate but everything was droopy and baggy in an unattractive ways: sleeves didnt conform to my arm shape, neckline drooped, from armpits to hem was ill-fitted (I wasnt looking for a body-con look, just something with the correct proportions). The garment length was a bit long for me too but if the sweater had otherwise fit it could have worked. Well - maybe it will work for you and congrats if so. I would have loved to have kept it but it didnt look good. Perhaps it just runs large. Read more
items.author: Miss Picky

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Winter Sweater Quest
items.body: For the $ paid - it’s a good buy. The sweater knit is kind of thin. The sizing is cut small. Could have used the next size (medium cut). But all in all ~ it wasn’t a bad item. Would order again. Read more
items.author: Ms. Daisy

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Good to wear for only a few times before it developed a hole and began pilling.
items.body: I wore it 6 times and it developed a hole at the bottom of the turtleneck line. It also became 'pilly' very quickly. Considering the $100 price, it should have lasted longer. Read more
items.author: Customer

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Petal Pink, Sky, Aqua, Blue, Berry, Cream, Black, Oatmeal, Red, Navy, Plum, Emerald, Forest, Teal. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
